Package fr.univ_lyon1.info.m1.balleauprisonnier_fx.view

Contains the view of the UI, the different screens

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlsView
    BorderPane View containing a TableView with the controls for each team human player and a button to start the game
    GameView
    A BorderPane with a pause button on top and the actual Game at the center
    GlobalButton
    A Button taking maximum width and a bit heigher than default
    ScoreView
    Displays the score when the game ends
